price: У кунда само ҳам ёрилгувчидир. У Зотнинг ваъдаси амалга ошгувчидир.
arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: al-samāu munfaṭirun bihi kāna waʿduhu mafʿūlan
